name: Ext_R5_Immunization_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Immunization.reason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Immunization.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Immunization|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Describes why the immunization occurred in coded or textual form, or Indicates another resource (Condition, Observation or DiagnosticReport) whose existence justifies this immunization.
element.comment: `Immunization.reason` maps to R4B `Immunization.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Immunization.reason` maps to R4B `Immunization.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Immunization.reason` maps to R4B `Immunization.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
